findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.
findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector

findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.
findings.name: array-length-outside-loop

findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.
findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.
findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
